Five-Headed Hydra: Darkvision 60 ft., fast healing 15, low-light vision, scent
Six-Headed Hydra: Darkvision 60 ft., fast healing 16, low-light vision, scent
Seven-Headed Hydra: Darkvision 60 ft., fast healing 17, low-light vision, scent

Five-Headed Hydra: Str 17, Dex 12, Con 20, Int 2, Wis 10, Cha 9
Six-Headed Hydra: Str 17, Dex 12, Con 20, Int 2, Wis 10, Cha 9
Seven-Headed Hydra: Str 19, Dex 12, Con 20, Int 2, Wis 10, Cha 9

Five-Headed Hydra: Combat Reflexes B , Iron Will, Toughness
Six-Headed Hydra: Combat Reflexes B , Iron Will, Toughness, Weapon Focus (bite)
Seven-Headed Hydra: Combat Reflexes B , Iron Will, Toughness, Weapon Focus (bite)

Five-Headed Hydra: Temperate marshes  (Pyro: Warm marshes)  (Cryo: Cold marshes)
Six-Headed Hydra: Temperate marshes  (Pyro: Warm marshes)  (Cryo: Cold marshes)
Seven-Headed Hydra: Temperate marshes  (Pyro: Warm marshes)  (Cryo: Cold marshes)
